This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0355 defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinitionV2 Concept CommentV2 Concept Comment As Published
PL Person locationPerson location
CE Coded elementCoded elementWithdrawn as of v2.6 - CE has been replaced by CNE and CWEWithdrawn as of v2.6 - CE has been replaced by CNE and CWE
CWE Coded with ExceptionsCoded with Exceptions

name: PrimaryKeyValueType
title: primaryKeyValueType
description: HL7-defined code system of concepts used to specify the type for the master file record identifier.  Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the Master File Entry (MFE) segment.
purpose: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0355 (Primary Key Value Type)
copyright: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

property.description: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

property.valueString: Withdrawn as of v2.6 - CE has been replaced by CNE and CWE
